name: BeltersRL_2019
description:
You are a prospector exploring Asteroids for
valuable ressources you landed on Asteroid Mining Station
243 Ida to await the next belt freighter to Earth. But the 
station does not respond the request for docking clearance.
So you wait until you needs to refuel and decide
to dock manually. Because of a failure in the docking 
software the air lock was not sealed.
The oxygen level starts to drop..
